channel.title: Sports

item.title: Darryn Peterson's Clutch 3-Pointers Lift Kansas Over Texas Tech
item.description: Kansas freshman Darryn Peterson scored 19 points, including two 3-pointers in the final 1:20 for his only field goals of the second half, and the 11th...

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Super Bowl Opening Night: Pats Embrace Underdog Role; Darnold Opens Up
item.description: Super Bowl LX week kicked off Monday with Opening Night festivities. Here are a few takeaways.

item.title: Best of Sam Darnold at Super Bowl LX Media Day

item.title: Sources: Bucks countering trade offers for Giannis
item.description: The Bucks have submitted counteroffers to teams aggressively seeking a trade for two-time MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Could Cristiano Ronaldo return to Man United?
item.description: Interest in Cristiano Ronaldo is already heating up in Europe and MLS, with Manchester United linked. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Seattle's Kubiak 'all-in' on LX amid Raiders buzz
